text: Hardly Working is a 1980 American comedy movie directed by Jerry Lewis (who also stars) and also starring Susan Oliver, Roger C. Carmel, Deanna Lund, Harold J. Stone, Steve Franken, Buddy Lester, Leonard Stone. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jerry Lewis
title: Hardly Working
